text: How are you feeling right now?
What would you like to explore?

prompts.text: Mode: listen. Ask curious questions about their experience. What are they feeling? What does this mean to them? How does this connect to what matters?
Mode: ideas. Ask what they've tried, what possibilities they see, what would feel good to explore? Then offer 1-2 thoughts if helpful.
Mode: blunt. Ask the direct question they're avoiding. What are they not saying? What truth are they dancing around?
That sounds really heavy. What kind of support would feel most helpful right now?
I care about you deeply. What other support would feel right for this?
